```{r}
dataset <- read.csv('dataFiltered3.csv')
dataset <- dataset[,-1] #Remove first column, which is not needed 

dataset$conf_group<- case_when(
        dataset$recog_rating >= 4 ~ 1,
        dataset$recog_rating <= 3 ~ 2)


p <- ggplot(dataset, aes(x=dataset$response_error, fill=as.factor(dataset$conf_group))) +
    geom_histogram(binwidth=.5, alpha=.8, position="identity") + theme(legend.title = element_blank()) 

g <- ggplot(dataset, aes(x=dataset$response_error)) +
    geom_histogram(binwidth=.5, alpha=.8, position="identity") + theme(legend.title = element_blank(), axis.text.x = element_text(size=10), axis.text.y = element_text(size=10)) 




```
